video.title: A Message to Humanity on the Corona Virus from His Holiness the Dalai Lama
video.description:
From the Bodhisattva of Compassion -Tenzin Gyatso, 14th Dalai Lama - a special message to humanity regarding the Corona Virus plus selected teachings on Compassion by His Holiness.

The transcript of his message can be read here:
https://www.dalailama.com/news/2020/a-special-message-from-his-holiness-the-dalai-lama

Music by: Jennifer Berezan and Friends - "Praises for the World".

Om Tare Tuttare Ture Soha
"I prostrate to the Liberator, Mother of all the Victorious Ones.”

During these uncertain, troubling days, His Holiness the Dalai Lama — when asked for spiritual advice on the pandemic — suggested that chanting the Green Tara mantra could be helpful.
video.channel_title: Samaneri Jayasāra - Wisdom of the Masters
